Events that occurred on 25 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1931 - Voice actor Fraser Kerr is born.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 55a.
1971 - Actor Sean Astin is born.
2004 - The Two Towers Anthology is released by Decipher.
2005 - Max Schuchart, the first to translate The Lord of the Rings, dies.
2013 - Tolkien and Wagner: The Ring and Der Ring is published.
2019 - Sub-creating Arda is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Around noon the Fellowship of the Ring passes the Argonath and reaches Nen Hithoel; they camp at Parth Galen.
First Battle of the Fords of Isen. Théodred son of Théoden is slain.
